titles.title: A bill to terminate the preemption of State and local laws that prohibit or regulate gaming or the operation of bucket shops, and for other purposes.
A bill to terminate the preemption of State and local laws that prohibit or regulate gaming or the operation of bucket shops, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Amends the Commodity Exchange Act to repeal the Act's preemption of any state or local law that prohibits or regulates gaming or operation of bucket shops.
